nodes.text: Fir Megsan was the child of a soldier who served in the Republic Military during the Great Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Megsan's father was present on the Republic capital of Coruscant when the Empire attacked the planet in the Sacking of Coruscant, and the man was killed by the Sith Lord Praven. In response, Megsan set a bounty on the Sith Pureblood, but every bounty hunter who attempted to kill Praven were instead killed by the Sith.

Fir Megsan first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the author of a message to Jedi Knight players who choose to kill Praven for dark side points after their confrontation on the planet Tatooine, instead of convincing him to become a Jedi for light side points. The message thanks the player for avenging Megsan's father, but does not specify what species or gender Megsan is. However, as the Knight is assumed to be a light side character, Megsan's bounty is assumed to never have been fulfilled.
